items.title: Transfer rumors, news: Saudi league eyes Salah, Vinícius Jr. plus 50 more
items.description: The Saudi Pro League has big plans to sign Liverpool's Mohamed Salah and Real Madrid's Vinícius Júnior. Transfer Talk has the latest.

items.title: Why the Broncos are confident in backup QB Jarrett Stidham: 'We have full faith in Stiddy'
items.description: The circumstances behind Stidham's AFC title game start haven't been seen since 1972, but the Broncos believe in their backup quarterback.

items.title: Can Sam Darnold overcome his nemesis -- the L.A. Rams -- to get to Super Bowl?
items.description: Seahawks quarterback Sam Darnold has struggled with turnovers against the Rams. Will Sunday be different?
